duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading the planning, design, delivery, and operation of computing infrastructure for digital research and wet-labs from various pharmaceutical sites.
Managing and developing on-premises and cloud-based server systems and services.
Ensuring IT Asset and Life Cycle management and evaluating new technologies to support business needs.
Implementing and evaluating software while ensuring smooth operations, robustness, and sustainability.
Communicating and building support for IT perspectives and initiatives.
Physical presence and overnight travel as required.

education_certification.credential: BSc degree in computer science, Information Systems, or related field required (documented relevant experience may be substituted when appropriate).
